import { useState } from 'react'; export default function PatientForm({ onAddPatient, onCancel }) { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', age: '', gender: 'Male', address: '', phone: '', email: '', bloodGroup: '', medicalHistory: '', status: 'Admitted' }); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); onAddPatient(formData); }; return (

Add New Patient

); }
